data.name: ALLOWFLOW
data.comment: Allow flow of transaction even on cut-off except approval (TRUE or FALSE)

data.name: ALLOWUNFROMLVFRACTION
data.comment: True if allowing UN to skip from leave fraction checking

data.name: ALLOWUNFROMMINLVHR
data.comment: True if allowing UN to be less than the minimum leave hour

data.comment: By-pass time moddification verification(TRUE or FALSE)

data.name: CHIYODASPECIFIC
data.comment: Set to true only if clietn is CHIYODA

data.name: CLINICSYSCNCK

data.comment: Connection String of Clinic System

data.name: CLINICSYSFLAG
data.comment: Flag if Clinic System is Used for Leave Filling

data.comment: Url of PDF Viewer of Clinic System

data.comment: Location of Medical Certificate Uploads

data.comment: Defualt Password Login

data.comment: Notify Email (TRUE or FALSE)

data.comment: Display credits in days or in hours. (TRUE or FLASE). Note for viewing only.

data.comment: Maximum font size (pt)

data.comment: Leave code for unpaid leave. Used in leave range for auto detection on unpaid

data.comment: Use illness code for Sick Leave

data.comment: Update shift to default if employee is on leave (TRUE or FALSE)

data.comment: Update shift to default if employee is on overtime(TRUE or FALSE)
